modName: Pretty Crystal Soul Gems with Refraction
summary: Refracting crystal soul gems with 1K textures.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][b][center][color=#ff0000]This mod is released [b]ONLY [/b]on Nexus. If you see it on other pages it's probably stolen.[/color]

[img width=805,height=585]http://i.imgur.com/kgThpPa.jpg[/img]
[img]https://media.giphy.com/media/PVqDP2odmtLH2/giphy.gif[/img][/center][/b][/size][color=#00ff00][size=3]DESCRIPTION: [/size][/color]
It's just my version of soul gems with 1K textures and refraction. It contains 1K version of my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82444/?]soul gem holders retexture[/url] (if you want less shiny glow map, you need to download it from there). Main Version of the mod contains glowing full soul gems. Optional files work for both main files.
Meshes from this mod will work with any textures that replace vanilla soul gems' textures, so you can use it with your favourite retexture mod if you don't like my design (as long as it doesn't replace meshes).
[size=3]
[color=#00ff00]INSTALLATION:[/color][/size]
Choose a main file you want to use and copy to your Data folder. Do the same with an optional file (if you want to use one). If you want to use different textures, install them after installing main file. Overwrite files if asked.

[size=3]NOT COMPATIBLE with any mods that alter soul gems' meshes (and textures) in any way.[/size]

I hope you like it. If so, please endorse :)

If you would like to use any part of this mod, please contact me first.


[b][size=3]MY OTHER MAGIC-RELATED MODS:[/size][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75492/?]Pretty Animated Potions and Poisons[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78748?]Pretty Animated Potions and Poisons - small bottles edition[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77541/?]Rustic Animated Potions and Poisons[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82444/?]Soul Gem Holders Alternate Texture - 2K retexture[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78921/?]Just Scrolls[/url]
author: dailyplanet
